heading: HR00901
0:
A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION AND SKILLS DEVELOPMENT
AUTHORITY TO INSTITUTE MEASURES THAT WILL MAKE DIGITAL
EDUCATION AVAILABLE AND ACCESSIBLE TO ALL STUDENTS AMID THE
CORONAVIRUS DISEASE 2019 (COVID-19) PANDEMIC IN THE PHILIPPINES
status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-05-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00901
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION AND SKILLS DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY TO INSTITUTE MEASURES THAT WILL MAKE DIGITAL EDUCATION AVAILABLE AND ACCESSIBLE TO ALL STUDENTS AMID THE CORONAVIRUS DISEASE 2019 (COVID-19) PANDEMIC IN THE PHILIPPINES
